title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 197/91 of 21 January 1991 modifying Annex II to Council Regulation (EEC) No 288/82 on common rules for imports with regard to products subject to surveillance
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) N° 197/91
of 21 January 1991
modifying Annex II to Council  Regulation (EEC) N° 288/82 on common rules for imports with regard to products subject to  surveillance
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNTIES
main_body: Annex II to Council Regulation (EEC) N°  288/82 is hereby replaced by the Annex attached to this Regulation.

This Regulation  shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European  Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 January 1991.
For the Council
The President
R. STEICHEN
(1) OJ N° L 35, 9. 2. 1982, p. 1.
(2) OJ N° L 292, 24. 10. 1990, p. 17.
(3) OJ N° C 37, 16. 2. 1987, p. 45.
ANNEX
ANNEX II Notes
(¹) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 4029/89 of 28 December 1989  modifying Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 235/86 introducing a Community surveillance of imports of  video tape recorders originating in South Korea
(OJ N° L 382, 30. 12. 1989, p. 67).
(²) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 4030/89 of 28 December 1989 extending the Community surveillance  of imports of certain products originating in Japan
(OJ N° L 382, 30. 12. 1989, p. 68).
(³) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 4031/89 of 28 December 1989 extending retrospective Community  surveillance of imports of certain products originating in Japan
(OJ N° L 382, 30. 12. 1989, p.  70).
(%) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 4032/89 of 29 December 1989 extending Regulation (EEC) N°  2819/79 making imports of certain textile products from certain third countries subject to  Community surveillance
(OJ N° L 382, 30. 12. 1989, p. 71).
(¹) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 4033/89 of 29 December 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) N° 2819/79  as regards certain textile products (categories 3, 33 and 41) originating in Turkey
(OJ N° L 382,  30. 12. 1989, p. 72).
(() Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 4034/89 of 29 December 1989 extending the periods of validity of  Regulations (EEC) N° 3044/79, (EEC) N° 1782/80 and (EEC) N° 4121/88, on Community surveillance of  imports of certain textile products originating in Malta, Egypt and Turkey
(OJ N° L 382, 30. 12.  1989, p. 77).
()) Commission Regulation (EEC) no 274/90 of 31 January 1990 introducing retrospective Community  surveillance of imports into the Community of footwear originating in all non-member countries
(OJ  N° L 30, 1. 2. 1990, p. 54).
( 7) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 1735/90 of 21 June 1990 introducing prior Community  surveillance of imports of certain types of footwear originating in South Korea and Taiwan
(OJ N° L  161, 27. 6. 1990, p. 12),
amended by Council Regulation (EEC) N° 3050/90 of 22 October 1990
(OJ N° L 292, 24. 10. 1990, p.  17).
(§) Commission Regulation (EEC) N° 2876/90 of 4 October 1990 extending Regulation (EEC) N° 2985/89  introducing a Community surveillance a posteriori of imports of certain textile products  originating in Tunisia and Morocco
(OJ N° L 275, 5. 10. 1990, p. 34).
LIST OF PRODUCTS  SUBJECT TO SURVEILLANCE
Key to symbols:
T = totally under surveillance;
P = partially under surveillance.
